# Summary of changes in Global Tags 
 
## Upgrade 
 
   * **PhaseI realistic scenario** : [81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v26](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v26) as [81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v25](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v25) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v26/81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v25): 
      * **RECO geom**: un-do the assignment of passive material outside the TK volume to the last layer of TK
      * **SIM geom**: Fix overlaps in Pixel support structure. Subtraction with Union solid replacement in ES support structure (no changes in sensitive volumes) . Pixel support structure material density has been corrected to compensate for the (very minimal) shape changes
 
   * **PhaseI design scenario** : [81X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v10](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v10) as [81X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v9](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v9) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v10/81X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v9): 
      * **RECO geom**: un-do the assignment of passive material outside the TK volume to the last layer of TK
      * **SIM geom**: Fix overlaps in Pixel support structure. Subtraction with Union solid replacement in ES support structure (no changes in sensitive volumes) . Pixel support structure material density has been corrected to compensate for the (very minimal) shape changes
 
   * **PhaseI cosmics scenario** : [81X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v9](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v9) as [81X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v8](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v8) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v9/81X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v8): 
      * **RECO geom**: un-do the assignment of passive material outside the TK volume to the last layer of TK
      * **SIM geom**: Fix overlaps in Pixel support structure. Subtraction with Union solid replacement in ES support structure (no changes in sensitive volumes) . Pixel support structure material density has been corrected to compensate for the (very minimal) shape changes
title: [81X] update RECO & SIM phase-1 geometry
